parameters.name: bhe_tenant
parameters.label: BHE Tenant
parameters.query:
BHEAttackPathsData_CL 
| where isnotempty(tenant_url)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by tenant_url
| extend display_name = replace_string(tenant_url, @"https://", "")
| extend display_name = replace_string(display_name, @"http://", "")
| extend display_name = replace_string(display_name, @"/", "") 
| project tenant_url, display_name

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.label: Domain
parameters.query:
BHEAttackPathsData_CL 
| where isnotempty(domain_name)
| where tenant_url in~ ({bhe_tenant})
| distinct domain_name

content.query:
BHEAttackPathsData_CL
| where tenant_url in~ ({bhe_tenant})
| where domain_name in~ ({domain_name})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id, domain_name, tenant_url
| summarize TotalAttackPathsFindings = dcount(id) by DomainName = domain_name
| sort by TotalAttackPathsFindings desc
content.title: Total Attack Paths Findings per Domain

content.query:
BHEAttackPathsData_CL
| where tenant_url in~ ({bhe_tenant})
| where domain_name in~ ({domain_name})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id, domain_name, tenant_url
| summarize Count = dcount(id) by Severity
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Severity Breakdown

content.query:
BHEAttackPathsData_CL
| where tenant_url in~ ({bhe_tenant})
| where domain_name in~ ({domain_name})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id
| where isnotempty(NonTierZeroPrincipalName)
| summarize FindingsCount = count() by NonTierZeroPrincipalName, domain_name
| sort by FindingsCount desc
| take 5
content.title: Top 5 Non-Tier Zero Principals Involved in Findings

content.query:
BHEAttackPathsData_CL
| where tenant_url in~ ({bhe_tenant})
| where domain_name in~ ({domain_name})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id, domain_name, tenant_url
| summarize Occurrence = dcount(id) by Finding
| sort by Occurrence desc
| take 5
content.title: Top 5 Most Common Findings

content.query:
BHEAttackPathsData_CL
| where tenant_url in~ ({bhe_tenant})
| where domain_name in~ ({domain_name})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id, domain_name, tenant_url
| extend exposure_val = toreal(ExposurePercentage),
         impact_val = toreal(ImpactPercentage)
| extend exposure_pct = iif(isnull(exposure_val), round(impact_val, 2), round(exposure_val, 2))
| extend impact_pct = round(impact_val, 2)
| summarize 
    ExposurePercent = max(exposure_pct),
    ImpactPercent = max(impact_pct),
    Remediation = any(Remediation),  
    Count = count()
    by Domain = domain_name, AttackPath = PathTitle, Severity
| project Domain, AttackPath, Severity, Count, ['Exposure (%)'] = ExposurePercent, ['Impact (%)'] = ImpactPercent, Remediation
| sort by ['Exposure (%)'] desc
content.title: All Attack Paths List
